name: JobTitle
description: The title or designation of the job position.

name: Company
description: The name of the company or organization offering the position.

name: Salary
description: The gross monthly salary for the job in euros or dollar depending on the location.

name: SkillFit
description: A numerical representation (1 to 5) indicating how well an individual's skills align with the job requirements.

name: Location
description: The city or region where the job is located.

name: CompanyType
description: The type or category of the company, such as 'Pharmaceutical' or 'Biotechnology'.

name: MainTask
description: The primary responsibilities and tasks expected to be performed in the role.

name: CompanyValues
description: The core principles or ethos that the company upholds and promotes.

name: Industry
description: The sector or field in which the company operates.

name: WorkLifeBalance
description: An assessment of the balance between work and personal time that the role allows.

name: Flexibility
description: Information on the flexibility of the job's working conditions, such as 'Hybrid' or 'Remote'.

name: Time
description: The type of employment in terms of time commitment, e.g., 'Full-time' or 'Part-time'.

name: BenefitsPackage
description: A brief summary of the additional perks or advantages provided by the company aside from the salary.

name: ReputationOfTheCompany
description: A description or statement about the company's standing or achievements in its industry.
